title: @Riot, what's the deal with Ranked Teams?
body: I'm keen to get back to playing the higher form of the game, but Ranked 5s is still unavailable. Do you have an ETA for it?

replies.body: Dynamic Queue has completely replaced Ranked 5's. There will be a solo only Ranked queue coming later, and most ranked rewards will be moved to Dynamic.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JswEQhEJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-16T15:23:25.839+0000)
>
> Dynamic Queue has completely replaced Ranked 5's. There will be a solo only Ranked queue coming later, and most ranked rewards will be moved to Dynamic.

I thought they had rumored bringing back a ranked 5's option? :(
They'll be bringing back Solo Queue, but I don't believe there are any plans to bring back Ranked Teams for the remainder of the season.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JswEQhEJ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-17T00:12:34.229+0000)
>
> They'll be bringing back Solo Queue, but I don't believe there are any plans to bring back Ranked Teams for the remainder of the season.

Man that sucks. No more playing with all our friends together in a ranked environment...

Do you have a link of something official?

Eh, that's dodgy. At it's core, Dynamic queue is still Solo/Duo Q. Ranked Teams on the other hand was a completely different environment in that people went into those matches with a game plan.

5-man premades in dynamic queue is more like a couple of games as 5, someone has to go, becomes 4-man, someone else has to go, becomes 3/2-man.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JswEQhEJ,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-17T00:46:50.523+0000)
>
> http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/XvqbAgrF-lets-talk-about-dynamic-queues-and-ranked-play
> 
> This should be the one!

Thanks for the reply.

So this was the reason... 

> The goal was to hone in on that team-like atmosphere without hitting the tremendous commitment issues of ranked 5â€™s.

I hate this.
